#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int Max(int a,int b)
{
	if(a>b)
		return a;
	return b;
}

int Min(int a,int b)
{
	if(a>b)
		return b;
	return a;
}

int main()
{
	int t,x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4,ans,a1,a2;
	
	cin>>t;

	while(t--)
	{
		a1=0;a2=0;ans=0;
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
		cin>>x3>>y3>>x4>>y4;
		if((x3>=x2) || (x4<=x1) || (y1>=y4) || (y2<=y3))
		{
			ans=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+((x4-x3)*(y4-y3));
			cout<<ans<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		else if(x3>=x1 && x4<=x2 && y3>=y1 && y4<=y2)
		{
			ans=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
			cout<<ans<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		else
		{
			ans=Max(0,Min(x4,x2)-Max(x1,x3))*Max(0,Min(y4,y2)-Max(y1,y3));
			a1=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
			a2=(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
			ans=a1+a2-ans;
			cout<<ans<<endl;
			continue;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
